fields.name: Killing Ability:
fields.value:
-Choose a player. You will attack them the next night. If you are no longer alive the next night, they will not get attacked. If you are roleblocked this night or next night, they will not get attacked. If they are transported this night, the player swapped with them will be your target the next night. If your target is transported next night, you will attack the player swapped with them.
Non-Killing Ability:
-Target a player. You will give them a cursed clock, which will have additive effects each night they have it, until they die.
0 nights: Their defense score is one weaker.
1 night: When targeting, they have a 25% chance to target a player to the left or right on them instead.
2 nights: They will be unable to speak in day chat unless a player votes for them at any point that day.
3 nights: Their ability will be permanently roleblocked.
4 nights: If any player visits them, they get hit by a Basic attack.

fields.name: Killing Ability (cont.):
fields.value: Goal: Overthrow the corrupt Town, and any sinister organizations lurking within, by any means necessary.
